getDensityInVeh

public java.lang.Double[] getDensityInVeh()
Density of vehicles per vehicle type in normalized units (vehicles/link/type). The return array is indexed by vehicle type in the order given in the settings portion of the input file.

Returns:
number of vehicles of each type in the link.

getTotalDensityInVeh

public double getTotalDensityInVeh()
Total of vehicles in normalized units (vehicles/link). The return value equals the sum of getDensityInVeh().

Returns:
total number of vehicles in the link.

getOutflowInVeh

public java.lang.Double[] getOutflowInVeh()
Number of vehicles per vehicle type exiting the link during the current time step. The return array is indexed by vehicle type in the order given in the settings portion of the input file.

Returns:
array of exiting flows per vehicle type.

getTotalOutflowInVeh

public double getTotalOutflowInVeh()
Total number of vehicles exiting the link during the current time step. The return value equals the sum of getOutflowInVeh().

Returns:
total number of vehicles exiting the link in one time step.

computeSpeedInMPH

public double computeSpeedInMPH()
Average speed of traffic in the link in mile/hour. The return value is computed by dividing the total outgoing link flow by the total link density.

Returns:
average link speed.
